item.title: About Online RSA | 5 Star Online Training
item.description: Online RSA is a partnership between a highly regarded registered training organisation, 5 Star Online Training and one of Australia’s most innovative online training platforms, Enrolo by eLearning Portal. We pride ourselves on the quality of our learning material and are constantly innovating to improve learner experience and learning outcomes. Unlike PDF based online learning, our learning is highly engaging with videos, voice-overs, games, challenges, simulated environments and challenging assessments.

item.title: All About the Online RSA Course | RSA FAQ
item.description: How do I enrol? You have two options to enrol. First option: You can continue to enrol directly after the payment process by clicking the Start Now option on the page. (you will not need to access your email) You will be taken to the student registration page, where you will need to click on the "Begin Registration" button to setup your student account. You will then have to input your personal information in the 6-step registration process.

item.title: Bulk RSA for Managers and Groups | Corporate RSA
item.description: Training Manager Account Are you an employer or job network provider interested in RSA training for staff? Some organisations prefer to bulk purchase Online RSA training, and then allocate the training to staff who need to complete their RSA. This is convenient because: We've streamlined the process for you, We make it easy to monitor progress and confirm completion, and You know your staff are getting consistent and high-quality RSA training.

item.title: Contact Online RSA for local RSA trainer support
item.description: Before contacting support: please check our Frequently Asked Questions page - we may have already answered your question there. If you have lost your RSA Certificate but did your training with another website/provider? Then unfortunately we are not able to assist you and you will need to remember their name and get in touch with them. Alternatively you can renew your RSA training with us and get a brand new up-to-date RSA certificate.

item.title: Download your Official RSA Certificate upon completion
item.description: On completion of your Online RSA course you can download and print your official national SITHFAB021 Provide Responsible Service of Alcohol statement of attainment - RSA certificate, that is issued by our Registered Training Organisation (RTO) 5 Star Online Training RTO# 45332. State-specific RSA certificates New South Wales and Victoria have an additional State based RSA certificate that we, as an approved provider, must manually apply for and issue to you.

item.title: Introduction to Wine Course | FREE with Your RSA Training
item.description: (non accredited) Understanding Wine Course Overview If you're going to be serving alcohol you will probably be serving wine, so it may help your employment prospects if you know more about wine than just "it comes in two colours". By completing this course you will be able to show potential employers in the restaurant or bar industry that you have some knowledge about wine and know how to have a conversation with customers to help them with purchases.

item.title: Join the Online RSA Affiliate Program and Promote Quality
item.description: If you are interested in pointing others in the direction of our online RSA training on your website and receiving commissions for doing so please send an email with your contact details to sales@elearningportal.com.au A representative will contact you to discuss in more detail.

item.title: Linking to the Online RSA website
item.description: If you or a member of your team have had a positive experience training with us, then we would kindly appreciate a link back from your website to ours! Linking to us helps establish our trustworthiness rating in the eyes of the search engines, above and beyond our not-so-ethical/capable competition. If you care about promoting high quality and ethical - ie. REAL - Responsible Service of Alcohol training, then please give us a link.

item.title: Login to Your Online RSA Training Account
item.description: Already purchased? If you have already purchased from us and enroled into one of our Online RSA courses, then you can login to your eLearning Portal account to continue your training. Click here to Login to eLearning Portal Not sure? If you are not sure if you purchased from Online RSA or elsewhere, you could try recovering your account and resetting your password. Click here to try Recovering your account

item.title: NSW RSA ONLINE 100% | Official Same-Day RSA Certificate
item.description: RSA Online New South Wales - Australia's #1 online RSA course High quality, 100% online RSA, same day ** Interim RSA Certificate, money back guarantee * Have a go at refusing service below and get $5 off RSA ONLINE with NSW specific content. We are a Liquor & Gaming NSW approved training provider, our course has been approved by L&G NSW to be delivered on behalf of L&G NSW. The course also complies with the national Provide Responsible Service of Alcohol SITHFAB021 (RSA) unit of competency.

item.title: NT RSA ONLINE 100% | Official Same-Day RSA Certificate NT
item.description: RSA Online Northern Territory - Australia's #1 online RSA course High quality, 100% online RSA, same day ** SITHFAB021 RSA Certificate, money back guarantee * Have a go at refusing service below and get $5 off RSA ONLINE with NT specific content. We are a Northern Territory government recognised trainer for the Provide Responsible Service of Alcohol SITHFAB021 (RSA) unit of competency. It takes just 2 minutes to begin. Start now and upon completion of the course download and print your SITHFAB021 RSA Certificate for the NT.

item.title: Online RSA Certificates | RSA FAQ
item.description: How long do RSA statement of attainments last for? It does vary between the States/Territories. Victoria (VIC): Statements of attainment last for 3 years after which you must undertake a free refresher course. There is a free online refresher course for people who would like to update their Victorian RSA training; please contact the Victorian Commission for Gambling and Liquor Regulation (VCGLR). Western Australia (WA), South Australia (SA), Queensland (QLD) and Tasmania (TAS): require that you have successfully completed the current nationally accredited course code for Provide Responsible Service of Alcohol SITHFAB021.

item.title: Online RSA Complaints Policy
item.description: We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Our team of professionals is dedicated to providing excellent service to both students and clients. We are committed to continuously improving our service and will make every effort to take on board your feedback in order to achieve this goal. Please download our Complaints and Appeals Policy for full details about our complaints process.

item.title: Online RSA has earned first class approvals in all States
item.description: The quality of the Online RSA course has earned it first class approvals in each and every State and territory of Australia. What this means to you is there is no additional State-based training required after completing our RSA course. It’s all included, saving you the time and hassle! Just complete our course, download your official RSA certificate and then you are good to start working in the chosen State or territory.

item.title: Online RSA is "the Original" and the Best RSA
item.description: Established in 2007, Online RSA has the grand title of being “the Original” RSA course to be delivered online in Australia. We’ve been proudly helping people take their first steps into the hospitality industry for over 17 years! Technology is what sets us apart Online RSA in partnership with Enrolo, continue to develop all the major software, systems and websites required to run the business! This is significant because typically these roles/sytems are outsourced to a number of completely unrelated entities.

item.title: Online RSA is a carbon-neutral business
item.description: Carbon-neutral RSA Online RSA believes in responsibly protecting the environment from it’s business activity. Online RSA was the first and (to our knowledge) still the only carbon-neutral RSA course online. We choose products and services that are better for the environment wherever possible and offset the remainder of our business activity. I think we can all agree, it’s just the right thing to do, especially when the choice is this easy.

item.title: Online RSA is a high integrity ethical business
item.description: Making good ethical choices is at the core of Online RSA. From our commitment to quality training, environmental protection and support of ethical causes in general. We are facing mounting pressure from cut-price online RSA courses that are pushing the support levels to near non-existant. All the while reducing learning materials to boring walls of text and making a mockery of assessment standards. Online RSA will never stray from providing the highest quality online RSA training and assessment possible.

item.title: Online RSA Money-Back Guarantee
item.description: Online RSA offers a 100% money-back satisfaction or change of mind guarantee for all purchases. Students are entitled to a full refund within 7 days so long as the following conditions are met: When a refund is requested within 7 days of purchase of the course and; When no course certificates or statements of attainment have been issued.

item.title: Online RSA Money-Back Guarantee & Refund Policy
item.description: Online Courses 5 STAR ONLINE TRAINING Refund Policy Whilst each case will be judged in isolation and take into consideration such issues as domestic circumstances, compassionate grounds, medical conditions, etc. Students are entitled to a full refund within 7 days when the following conditions are met: When a refund is requested within 7 days of purchase of the course and; When no course certificates or statements of attainment have been issued.

item.title: Online RSA Payment Options | RSA FAQ
item.description: What are my payment options? You have a choice between using PayPal or Credit card. If you would like to arrange a direct deposit, send a cheque or send a purchase order instead, please contact us to have this arranged. How will this transaction appear on my credit card statement? Purchases from this site will be listed on your statement as paid to eLearning Portal. eLearning Portal/Enrolo are our payment processing and learning management system service providers.

item.title: Online RSA Privacy Statement
item.description: 5 Star Online Training Pty Ltd ABN 85 621 258 802 and our staff collectively (WE) are absolutely committed and focused on preserving and protecting your private information and complying with all applicable privacy legislation, including the National Privacy Principles of Australia. This privacy statement describes how we go about collecting and managing your personal information in a confidential manner. Our procedures for protecting your personal information do not in any way diminish our obligation of confidentiality to you, or any of our other clients, nor do these procedures take away any legal professional privilege to which you or our other customers may be entitled.

item.title: Online RSA Refresher Course
item.description: All of Online RSA’s fully accredited RSA courses can be used as RSA refresher courses too. In the case that you have already done a prior RSA course and understand the concepts, you are able to fast forward through those parts of the learning material. PLEASE NOTE: we are a highly ethical registered training organisation. Our RSA assessment is high-integrity and won’t allow students to simply guess their way through. There is ample training material for anyone to learn RSA from scratch and we provive all the expert support you may require.

item.title: Online RSA Terms of Use
item.description: ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS 5 Star Online Training RTO #45332 (FST), online RSA Website have services provided through eLearning Portal Pty Ltd (“ELP”) and are subject to the following Terms of Use (“TOU”) and the Software License Agreement on our website. 5 Star Online Training reserves the right to update the TOU at any time without notice to you. The most current version of the TOU can be reviewed by clicking on the “Terms of Use” hypertext link located at the bottom of our web pages.

item.title: Start and complete your Online RSA the Same-Day
item.description: Yes, with Online RSA it’s possible to start and finish your RSA course all on the same day! We can honestly make this claim because of the unique way we assess you throughout the course and mark in the background as you continue to progress. So there is no big long assessment and wait for marking at the end, like all other providers we are aware of. But to set your expectations, we generally only mark during business hours AEST, Monday to Friday.

item.title: State by State RSA Requirements Explained | RSA FAQ
item.description: Can I get one RSA training course that will cover the whole of Australia? Yes, but.. Unfortunately some states and territories have differing requirements for RSA training, assessment and certificate/badge/competency cards. Therefore it is not possible to do one single course that will satisfy all requirements for all states, but, you are able to bridge your qualification to the other states. Our recommendation is that you should choose the state where you are most likely to start working and complete that course, making sure to click on all of the available state variations when you come to the map sections.

item.title: Workplace Hygiene for Food Handlers Online
item.description: (non accredited) Overview This course gives hospitality staff the necessary skills in food safety and food hygiene matters, ensuring compliance with the Australia New Zealand Food Standards Code Standard 3.2.2 Food Safety Practices and General Requirements. This course is divided into the following four sections each with an online assessment; Introduction You and your workplace Understanding contamination Typical workplace tasks Buy workplace hygiene on its own $30 (includes GST)

item.title: Your Online RSA Technical Questions Answered | RSA FAQ
item.description: I lost or forgot my Username/password - can I retrieve it? You cannot retrieve your password, but you can reset it. Please return to the student login page and follow the instructions for a forgotten username or password. Do I need to install any special software or apps? No. Only a modern standards compliant web browser is required, eg. Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari, Microsoft Edge, etc.. Our preferred browsers to use are; For desktop PC and Mac computers: Google Chrome.

item.title: Your Questions About the RSA Answered | RSA FAQ
item.description: For answers to frequently asked questions please choose a category below and click a link for more details. About the Course How do I enrol? Is it possible to fail the course? Can people less than 18 years of age do the Online RSA training? Do I need a Unique Student Identifier (USI)? How long does it take to complete the course? How do I reattempt Questions or Quizzes? How many times can I reattempt questions?

item.title: Your RSA Training Provider Questions Answered | RSA FAQ
item.description: How can I ensure that a training provider is authorised to deliver the training? 5 Star Online Training Pty Ltd RTO #45332 is registered in all states and territories to deliver Provide Responsible Service of Alcohol SITHFAB021 training You can check whether an RTO is authorised to deliver the training by contacting your State/Territory liquor authority. There is a list of each State/Territory liquor authority (along with contact details for each) here.
